title: How to Log in to Game Center

steps.headline:
Open your iPhone or iPad’s Settings {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/7\/7e\/Iphonesettingsappicon.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/7\/7e\/Iphonesettingsappicon.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

steps.description: You’ll usually find it on the home screen.

steps.headline: Scroll down and tap Game Center.
steps.description: It’s near the center of the list.

steps.headline:
Slide the “Game Center” switch to {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/1\/15\/Iphoneswitchonicon1.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/1\/15\/Iphoneswitchonicon1.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":300,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":495.6521739130435,"licensing":"

I edited this screenshot of an iPhone\n<\/p>

License: Fair Use<\/a>
\n<\/p><\/div>"}.
Tap Continue.
steps.description: This signs you into Game Center using the Apple ID that’s currently logged into your phone or tablet. If you want to sign in with a different Apple ID, tap Not (person’s name)? to enter a username and password.

steps.headline:
Click the {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/f\/ff\/Macapple1.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/f\/ff\/Macapple1.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":476,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":786.2068965517242,"licensing":"

\n<\/p><\/div>"} menu.
steps.description: It’s at the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.headline: Click Internet Accounts.
steps.description: It’s the round blue icon with a white “@” inside.

steps.headline: Click +.
steps.description: It’s at the bottom-left corner of the left column.

steps.headline: Scroll down and click Add Other Account….
steps.description: It’s the final option under the list of account types.

steps.headline: Click Game Center account.
steps.description: It’s the for overlapping circles of varying colors and sizes.

steps.headline: Enter your Apple ID username and password and click Sign In.
steps.description: Once the password is accepted, you’ll be logged into Game Center.

iPhone and iPad Open your iPhone or iPad’s Settings {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/7/7e/Iphonesettingsappicon.png","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/7/7e/Iphonesettingsappicon.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

"}. You’ll usually find it on the home screen. Scroll down and tap Game Center. It’s near the center of the list. Slide the “Game Center” switch to {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/1/15/Iphoneswitchonicon1.png","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/1/15/Iphoneswitchonicon1.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":300,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":495.6521739130435,"licensing":"

I edited this screenshot of an iPhone

License: Fair Use

"}. A confirmation message will appear. Tap Continue. This signs you into Game Center using the Apple ID that’s currently logged into your phone or tablet. If you want to sign in with a different Apple ID, tap Not (person’s name)? to enter a username and password. macOS Click the {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/f/ff/Macapple1.png","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/f/ff/Macapple1.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":476,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":786.2068965517242,"licensing":"

I edited this screenshot of a Mac icon.

License: Fair Use

"} menu. It’s at the top-left corner of the screen. Click System Preferences. Click Internet Accounts. It’s the round blue icon with a white “@” inside. Click +. It’s at the bottom-left corner of the left column. Scroll down and click Add Other Account…. It’s the final option under the list of account types. Click Game Center account. It’s the for overlapping circles of varying colors and sizes. Enter your Apple ID username and password and click Sign In. Once the password is accepted, you’ll be logged into Game Center.
